text: She Devil is a 1957 American science fiction horror movie directed by Kurt Neumann and based on the short story The Adaptive Ultimate by Stanley G. Weinbaum. It stars Jack Kelly, Mari Blanchard, Albert Dekker, John Archer, Fay Baker. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1957 horror movies Category:1957 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Kurt Neumann
title: She Devil
